Elemental Fury.name: Elemental Fury
Elemental Fury.description: Elemental energy wreathes your form and infuses your magic. Either you gain a +2 status bonus to Intimidation checks for 1 round, or a target takes 1 damage per spell rank; this damage type is listed under your elemental influence. If the spell already deals that type of damage, combine it with the spell's initial damage before determining weaknesses and resistances.
